item.title: Debugging a .Net Core application running in a Docker container, using VS Code
item.author: Author
item.description: With todayâ€™s technologies, it is very easy to develop and run multi-platform applications since we have code editors such as Visual Studio Code, Microsoft .Net Core (2.0 in its most recent version) and Docker containers. On the Windows platform, Visual Studio 2017 provides the tools to develop .Net Core applications and support for debugging directly in a Docker container. But in other platforms (Linux, MacOS) is not so clear the process to be able to perform this type of debugging processes; this is the reason to write this article.
